meanings.definition: The yield of wine or grapes from a vineyard during one season.
meanings.sent1: The vintages from the vineyard were plentiful this year.
meanings.sent2: Winemakers eagerly await the vintages from the harvest.
meanings.sent3: The vintages decided to have a party in the vineyard.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like a fine vintage, rich and full of flavor.
meanings.sent5: The vintages danced in the sunlight, a celebration of abundance.

meanings.definition: The time or place of origin of a wine.
meanings.sent1: The vintage of this wine is from a famous vineyard.
meanings.sent2: Knowing the vintage of a wine can help understand its quality.
meanings.sent3: The vintage proudly displayed its label from France.
meanings.sent4: Her memories of childhood were a vintage of happiness and laughter.
meanings.sent5: The vintage whispered secrets of the soil and sun where it was born.

meanings.definition: The year or place in which wine, especially wine of high quality, was produced.
meanings.sent1: This vintage of wine is from a renowned winery.
meanings.sent2: The vintage of this wine is 2015, a great year for grapes.
meanings.sent3: The vintage decided to take a vacation to the vineyard where it was born.
meanings.sent4: His words were a vintage of wisdom, aged and refined over time.
meanings.sent5: The vintage of memories flooded back, each sip of wine a reminder of the past.
